attributes.action: Ban Importation of Israeli Goods unless independently verified as not from occupied territories
attributes.additional_details: The State of Israeli has illegally, under UN Resolutions and International Law, occupied or controlled many areas of the former Palestine. Vineyards and orchards have often been destroyed. A Ban should be placed on any goods entering the UK that cannot be independently verified as not produced in the illegally occupied territories of the West bank, Gaza, East Jerusalem, Golan heights, Shebaa Farms and others. Further, we should not allow exports of any type that are likely to be used by any Israeli operating or living in those illegally occupied territories.
